name: Juno digital planner
tagline: All your tasks and events in one calm, offline-first planner
description: Juno is your personal productivity hub, helping high achievers plan, prioritize, and track progress. Auto-reschedule tasks, set due dates, estimate and log time, and avoid overload. Integrations with calendar, Gmail, Todoist, and more unify your workflow.

name: Artifacts
tagline: Collect, share and celebrate what endures through objects.
description: Objects carry stories and shape lives. Artifacts is a space to honor what lasts—a place to collect, share, and celebrate what truly endures through the things we keep close. Curate. Build and share your personal collection of objects. Discover. Explore a growing archive of thoughtfully curated pieces. Connect. Join a community of people who value intentional owning.

name: Planndu
tagline: AI todo list, task manager, planner & reminder app, tasks
description: Planndu is here to help you plan, stay organized, and get things done! We integrated the fastest AI model on the marketing, to help you turn your thoughts into structured to-do lists. We bring together tasks, notes, focus timers, and templates, to create repeatable tasks, workflows, and daily routines with a single tap.

name: Proximity Lock System 2.0
tagline: Never worry about leaving your computer unlocked again.
description: Proximity Lock System is a CLI tool that automatically locks your system when your paired Bluetooth device (like your phone) goes out of range. It continuously monitors nearby devices, ensuring your computer stays secure when you step away. - Akarshjha03/ProximityLockSystem

name: RingIt
tagline: Never lose your phone again
description: RingIt lets trusted friends or family make your device ring loudly for 30 seconds, even if it’s on silent. It’s fully cross-platform (iPhone ↔ Android), so no logging into Find My, no web portal, no ecosystem lock-in. Just tap, ring, find.

name: No Contact Tracker
tagline: The #1 way to get over your ex.
description: Let Them Go is a super simple "No Contact" tracking app. With mood tracking, journaling, beautiful quotes, and more, getting over your ex becomes easy. Keep your cute little plant pet healthy by watering it every day. Water is earned after completing your daily tasks.

name: GitHub Repo Visibility Analyzer
tagline: Make devs notice your repo
description: Improve your repo’s visibility in GitHub searches, Google, and LLMs. This free tool audits your repository to give you topic tag suggestions and other recommended action items to help developers find your project more easily.

name: LaunchOS
tagline: A Launchpad Alternative for macOS 26(Tahoe)
description: LaunchOS is the perfect Launchpad alternative for macOS 26 Tahoe. It almost replicates all the details of the system's native Launchpad (with some still in progress), looking almost identical to the native Launchpad in both appearance and user experience. It also supports the liquid glass effect and adds many improved features. You will definitely like it.

name: ClipboardAI
tagline: Instantly run AI prompts with shortcuts, anywhere.
description: ClipboardAI lets you transform any selected text with your own AI prompts…using nothing but a keyboard shortcut. No app-switching, no copy-pasting, no memorizing prompts. Just instant results in the apps you’re already using. Create as many custom prompts as you want: fix grammar and spelling, translate to Spanish, change tone, summarize, shorten, expand. Anything. Just select your text, press your shortcut, wait for the AI to finish, hit Enter to copy or Shift+Enter to paste instantly.

name: action.it
tagline: Privacy AI Meeting Agent
description: Private AI Meeting Agent That Automatically Posts Your Notes Without Retaining Your Data.

name: Codeflash
tagline: Make your Python code run up to 10x faster automatically
description: Codeflash optimizes all your Python code. It uses advanced AI and verification to automatically find the most optimized version of any Python code. Installing Codeflash as a GitHub Action or VS Code extension ensures that all new Python code your team and your agents write is always optimal and runs fast.

name: PartGenie
tagline: AI for Electronics Designing and Sourcing
description: PartGenie is your AI co-pilot for electronics component sourcing and design. Simply ask AI for specific components, complete solution designs, or intricate technical questions. Instantly analyze datasheets, optimize your BOM, and find in-stock alternatives to accelerate your hardware development from months to days.

name: SpotInfo AI - Lead Conversion Platform
tagline: 5X your conversions with AI-powered user engagement
description: Transform website visitors into paying customers with AI agents that personalize discovery, answer research questions in real-time, and identify high-intent leads. Improve Lead to conversions by 5X. Multi-channel support (website, app, WhatsApp, phone). Launch in minutes - no coding needed. Built for SaaS, insurance, healthcare, real estate, lending, education, and automotive companies. Reduce CAC by 30%, see results in 4 weeks

name: Provolo
tagline: The future of Freelancing
description: Provolo is an AI-powered tool helping freelancers stand out and land more clients through smarter profile optimization and AI-generated proposals. We understand that great work starts with great presentation, so we make it easy for freelancers to put their best selves forward.

name: EveryoneAI
tagline: Global Chatrooms, Trending Debates & AI Interest Matchmaker.
description: EveryoneAI is a global chat platform with real-time conversations, live trending debates, and even conflicts—not a cold friend request or swipe. Just like how humans build relationships in real life! Our AI-Powered Interest Matching (MatchAI) instantly connects users around the world who share the same interests, hobbies or views. Premium users can create Private Communities: passcode-protected, invite-only groups with voice calls. We're making genuine global connections effortless at scale.

name: SparkBuilt
tagline: Ideas don't wait; Neither should you
description: SparkBuilt provides production ready MVP along with validation insights, decks, and targeted funding resources. Instead of using multiple tools for research, planning, and building, SparkBuilt gives founders one workflow that produces everything they need to validate, build, and launch fast.

name: Semis
tagline: The all-in-one platform to retain & grow talent
description: Semis helps companies boost retention, employee satisfaction, and mobility by uniting knowledge sharing, and development into one platform.

name: unboxd ai
tagline: Email Experience Reinvented - Intelligent Mail Without Inbox
description: Don't read emails. Don't clean up inboxes. Delegate it to an ai secretary. Your ai secretary will read everything, extract important things to do (action items) and important things to know (highlights) and categorizes everything else in (FYIs) with sub-categories. Email inbox is obsolete. It's been 50 years since the invention of it. Inbox is "AN INFINITE LIST OF ITEMS!"; it sounds like a horrible ux, isn't it? unboxd is the end of email inbox. we go from electronic mail to intelligent mail.

name: Nexus API
tagline: Your all-access pass to top AI models — free & fast
description: Nexus API unifies top AI models (ChatGPT, Gemini, Qwen & more) into one simple REST API. Generate text, images and visual analysis — 500 free uses/day, no rate limits. SDKs: npm (@mvkproject/nexus) and PyPI (nexusai-py). Support: Discord (Nexus Hub) — https://discord.com/invite/C8tdHqM — or email drezus.nexus@gmail.com. Docs: https://nexus.drexus.xyz/utilities/api-docs-index

name: Backternity
tagline: Build backends faster than your UI
description: Build scalable backend systems in minutes with modular, production-ready components. Modular Backend. Minimal Effort. Authentication, data, and messaging. Backternity is built for the moment every developer knows well: the UI is complete, the product looks polished, and now the real work begins—the backend. Instead of slowing down to rebuild authentication, databases, logging, rate limiting, workers, or integrations from scratch, Backternity lets you assemble them like components.
